title: Ambitious Card
description: A selected card repeatedly returns to the top of the deck, no matter how many times it is placed in the middle.

title: Torn and Restored Newspaper
description: A newspaper is torn into pieces and then magically restored to its original state.

title: Floating Bill
description: A borrowed bill levitates in mid-air, seemingly defying gravity.

title: Cups and Balls
description: One of the oldest tricks in magic, where balls vanish, appear, and transpose under three cups.

title: Mental Epic
description: A prediction, sealed in an envelope, perfectly matches the random choices of three audience members.

title: Chinese Linking Rings
description: Solid metal rings link and unlink in a beautiful and mysterious routine.

title: Sponge Balls
description: Soft sponge balls vanish from the magician's hand and appear in the spectator's hand.

title: Cut and Restored Rope
description: A rope is cut in the middle and then magically restored to a single piece.
